item.title: Single player AI?
item.author: invalid@example.com (CyMek)
item.dc:creator: CyMek
item.content:encoded: Is it even possible to get a single player AI opponent to play against? I love the mod, but it's really hard to find people to play against, and even a computer to play against would go a long way towards rectifying this.

item.title: Music
item.author: invalid@example.com (maniac12ca)
item.dc:creator: maniac12ca
item.content:encoded: Hey. I'm sitting here listing to the music from the latest front page news post, it sounds GREAT. Just thinking though, it's not what I, personally, would envision as fitting for Uskaarj. Not that it's not good enough, that it just seems sorta the wrong style IMHO.

item.title: Need an idea?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pupazz)
item.dc:creator: Pupazz
item.content:encoded:
I have tons of ideas in my head, only they come they go . this is an idea that i kept in mind:
As most of us know there is that butterfly bomber, its being called in with ons painter, but there is also a butterfly bomber that can be controled by players and it shoots rockets( found that out when making a realy big map, learned to control it to ) its hard to control, has low health, the projectiles that are shot are shot in a wierd way(when flying fast it shoots forward when not...

Need an idea?

item.title: Mechanized units
item.author: invalid@example.com (isocryd)
item.dc:creator: isocryd
item.content:encoded:
Heavy infantry, like a soldier with a heavy battlesuit that can carry a dual shoulder-mounted rocket launcher or twin chainguns.

Hell, if I had a wish i knew would come true, I'd wish for small versions of BattleMechs (Yep, I have Mechwarrior in mind)

Sorry, but I can't take out of my mind the wish for heavy units.

item.title: Resources idea
item.author: invalid@example.com (isocryd)
item.dc:creator: isocryd
item.content:encoded:
Every RTS player can tell you this. After a long match (and specially frantic ones) Resources simply run out. Also, a lame tactic I've seen is to simply "outresource" the enemy (Defend until the enemy has no more resources).

Command and Conquer's tiberium regenerates over time.
Dark Reign's Taleon has the option of regenerate Taleon wells.
Battlezone 2 has unlimited resources in every biometal pool.
Empire Earth has an obscene amount of resources in every mine(300,000 each or so)....

Resources idea

item.title: Help me :(
item.author: invalid@example.com (mrgiggles)
item.dc:creator: mrgiggles
item.content:encoded:
At the risk of sounding lame... the zip for the install had only one file in it (which seemed a little odd to me) and it wasn't a self installer it's 'USkaarj.ut2mod' and I have no idea what to do with it

Thanks in advance

item.title: nice first release...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Quex)
item.dc:creator: Quex
item.content:encoded:
don't know where to put it else . i must say, it's a nice first alpha (beta) you released. i hope the next one will come in not so long time, because in this version you only can build 2 units (3 with the constructionbot) an only 2 buildings. it's funny and realy great work but to play in mp with only two units...you know what i mean. ah and what would be a nice feature is when you want to build a building and move arround with the mouse that then you see the building outline, so that you...

nice first release...

item.title: Gameplay Movie?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Quex)
item.dc:creator: Quex
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
i sitting here in front of my pc, watching a cs: source video, when suddenly me comes the idea if you guys of the mod team could make an short gameplay movie too, or s.th. in this way. Would be very cool and nice and shouldn't make too much work. I hope my little wish will be heard , because it's much better than screenshots.

item.title: Story?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Quex)
item.dc:creator: Quex
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
me again . I only want to ask if there are any news about the story of "USkaarj II"? Any new information? Would be great if i could get some, so i can post them on my fansite .

item.title: Pure RTS?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pupazz)
item.dc:creator: Pupazz
item.content:encoded:
Is the mod going to be a pure RTS with no other gameplay elements ?
What I'm trying to ask is, is there going to be FPS(Like commandos could be actual players)? If not, then this is a suggestion. It would attract a lot of fans, because of the nice teamplay possibility .(dont need the field filled with players, only a few in the form of commandos .

item.title: when comes a nex update?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Quex)
item.dc:creator: Quex
item.content:encoded:
Hi guys,
when there will be the next update (images or other news)?
I can't still wait . Want to play this ultimative great mod.

k
